title: Champion name was replaced with "Wolf" during game.
body:
I was playing a game of ARAM when I noticed something odd. Rammus was replaced with "Wolf" in the chat. This happened for just a minute and then it was gone. Rammus has no idea why this happened. I've blurred out the names for privacy.

WHO IS WOLF?

replies.body: I've had games where champion names are all together removed from chat. I don't quiet have pictures of such a thing happening but the majority of the time it's an Ezreal who's name is gone.
lmao yea. That game went really well for me.
Did you have a Lulu in your game? If I'm not mistaken this is a Polymorph bug that we're currently working on.
There was someone else who had this issue only it was a warwick (or nasus cant remember clearly)
